page.title: 05ALTON WATER RESERVOIR P.2
page.content: In addition to water supplies Alton Water Reservoir was designed to be a leisure ,recreation and nature conservation area. Facilities have been provided for sailing, fishing, bird watching and rambling.These areas are very carefully designated so as not to interfere with the conservation areas.There are wooded areas and picnic sites have been provided. Areas of shallow water have been set aside as nature conservation areas. They have notice boards here saying "NO FISHING"and the public are not allowed in these places.Alton Water attracts many wild birds such as Coots Shelduck Swans,Great Crested Grebes Tufted Ducks,Pintails,Skylarks,Reed Bunting etc.There are also many wild flowers.It is very nice to walk around.
